entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
